The expert: s verdict states that the image has been doctored and is not authentic.
The original photograph: taken on 8 December 2014, shows LeBron James wearing an "I Can't Breathe" t-shirt in honor of Eric Garner, who was killed by police officers.
Multiple sources: including news articles from USA Today and ESPN, confirm that LeBron James wore the "I Can't Breathe" shirt during a game, supporting the authenticity of the original image.
